original_title: Foo Fighters – Landmarks Live in Concert: A Great Performances Special
overview: Multi-Grammy-winning rock band Foo Fighters delivers an electrifying, historic performance at the famed Odeon of Herodes Atticus from the Acropolis in Athens, Greece, in the latest installment of Landmarks Live in Concert for GREAT PERFORMANCES.
tagline: Historic concert filmed this summer at the Acropolis in Athens, Greece
title: Foo Fighters – Landmarks Live in Concert: A Great Performances Special
